title: Feature Toggle off on Release Builds
custom_preconds: Release Build and Debug Build available
custom_steps: Long Press on the MLB App Icon and select Widgets
custom_expected: Widget appears and can be added on all builds

title: Widget Loading
custom_preconds: Test with a user that has a favorite team and one that does not
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user
WHEN adding the MLB widget
AND the user has a favorite team selected
THEN show the team selection template

title: Main States
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user
WHEN calling the Android system widget interface
THEN a 4x1 MLB widget should appear

GIVEN a user
WHEN tapping on the MLB widget
AND the user has a favorite team selected
AND the widget is not in offseason mode
THEN take the user to Gameday

title: Hide Spoilers
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user
WHEN viewing the MLB widget
AND the user has a favorite team selected
AND the widget is not in offseason mode
AND the user has Hide Scores enabled
THEN no score information is displayed
AND 'Hide Spoilers ON' is displayed instead 

GIVEN a user
WHEN tapping on the MLB widget
AND the user has a favorite team selected
AND the widget is not in offseason mode
AND the user has Hide Scores enabled
THEN take the user to the teams tab

title: Widget Preview
custom_steps:
GIVEN a USER
WHEN I select widgets
THEN I will see a preview that is representative of and height/width that is the size of the widget

title: Widget Persistence
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user has added a widget to their home screen 
AND a team has been selected from the widget team picker
WHEN restarting their phone
THEN the widget should display the selected team's information

title: Off Season Layout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND the regular season is over

Note: attached file may help set up tests
custom_steps:
Testing notes: map attached test files to api call eg:
 https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/teams?teamId=117&hydrate=standings()%2Cdivision()%2CnextSchedule(team%2CgameType%3D%5BF%2CD%2CL%2CW%2CC%5D%2Cinclusive%3Dfalse%2Climit%3D1)%2CpreviousSchedule(team%2CgameType%3D%5BF%2CD%2CL%2CW%2CC%5D%2Cinclusive%3Dfalse%2Climit%3D1)
Team id will be different depending on teams in files

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a widget is added for a team that is NOT in the postseason
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the widget will display (see attached image) in off-season layout and show that team’s divisional standing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a widget is added for a team that is actively playing in the postseason
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the pregame/live/postgame widget layout will display

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a widget is added for a team that was eliminated in the Wild Card, Divisional Series, or LCS
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the widget will display in off-season layout and show that team’s divisional standing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a widget is added for a team that was eliminated in the World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the widget will display in off-season layout and show “American/National League Champion”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a widget is added for a team that that won the World Series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the widget will display in off-season layout and show “World Series Champion”

title: Custom Team App Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on a screen of their device (eg. home screen)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they launch the menu to add a widget
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will have the option to add a custom 1x1 MLB Teams widget to their home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they choose the option to add the widget and select a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a 1x1 widget (icon size) representing the team selected is added to the home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the widget
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they are taken to the team page of the team represented by the widget

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user follows the steps to remove the widget via the system (eg. long press)
